script.name: plugin.guilds.bounty.event
script.sourceplaintext:
$guild.data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
if $a.event == [Event.Killed] if $a.par2 -> exists if $a.par2 -> is of class Ship $attacker = $a.par2 -> get true owner else $attacker = $a.par2 -> get owner race end if $attacker == Player gosub sub.DoBountyKill end end
else if $a.event == [Event.SelfDestruct] if $a.par1 == 17 $tBounty = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='bounty' $bounty.guild = $guild.data['bounty'] $tBounties = $bounty.guild['bounties'] do if $tBounties remove key $a.obj from table $tBounties $pilot = $a.obj ->get pilot speaker $sector = $a.obj -> get sector $tShips = $sector ->get ship table from sector/ship/station if $tShips $pilot = $tBounty['pilot'] $key = get next key: table=$tShips key=null while $key $aPassengers = $key -> get passenger array if $aPassengers $i = size of array $aPassengers while $i dec $i = $p = $aPassengers[$i] if $p == $pilot $pay = $tBounty['pay'] $pay = convert number $pay to string $pay = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $pay, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $p ->set passenger info: id='bounty.pay' pageid=$page.id textid=1014 info=$pay $name = $p -> get pilot name $p ->set local variable: name='bounty.name' value=$name $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1015 $name = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $name, $read.text, null, null, null $p ->set pilot name to $name return null end end end $key = get next key: table=$tShips key=$key end end end
else if $a.event == [Event.GKilled] if $a.par2 -> exists if $a.par2 -> is of class Ship $attacker = $a.par2 -> get true owner else $attacker = $a.par2 -> get owner race end if $attacker == Player gosub sub.DoBountyKill end end
else if $a.event == [Event.Captured] if $a.par1 -> exists $tBounty = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='bounty' $a.par1 ->set local variable: name='bounty' value=$tBounty $tBounty['ship'] = $a.par1 $bounty.guild = $guild.data['bounty'] $tBounties = $bounty.guild['bounties'] if $tBounties if $tBounties[$a.obj] remove key $a.obj from table $tBounties $tBounties[$a.par1] = $tBounty end end $flags = [Event.Killed] | [Event.GKilled] | [Event.SetEnv] | [Event.SelfDestruct] $a.par1 ->attach event script: events=$flags, script=plugin.guilds.bounty.event $a.obj ->remove event script: script=plugin.guilds.bounty.event end
end
return null
sub.DoBountyKill: $bounty.kill = [TRUE] gosub sub.DoBounty endsub
sub.DoBounty: $tBounty = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='bounty' $guild = $tBounty['guild'] $type = $tBounty['type'] $level = $tBounty['level'] if $type == 1 OR ( $type == 2 AND $bounty.kill ) OR ( $type == 3 AND ! $bounty.kill ) OR $type == 4 if $guild.data[$guild]['member'] $guild.level = $guild.data[$guild]['level'] if $guild.level >= $level $pay = $tBounty['pay'] $xp = $tBounty['xp'] $speaker = $a.obj ->get pilot speaker $speaker = $speaker -> get name if $guild == 'assassin' add player money: $pay, transaction object=$a.par2, page=$page.id, textid=400018, $speaker, null, null, null, null else add player money: $pay, transaction object=$a.par2, page=$page.id, textid=1006, $speaker, null, null, null, null end $text = convert number $pay to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null if $guild == 'assassin' $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=400018, $text, null, null, null, null else $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=1008, $text, null, null, null, null end display notification: message=$read.text, icon=106 play sample 985 @ START [NULL] -> call script plugin.guilds.doexp : Exp=$xp Guild=$guild Delay=5000 end end end endsub return null
